nb2script[source]

nb2script(nb_name, export_name)

Finds cells starting with #export and puts them into a new module

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from nbdev.export import *
notebook2script()

Converted 00_core.ipynb.
Converted index.ipynb.
{% endraw %}
